roleset.name: slander, defame
roleset.note: BESMIRCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'besmirch' based on EBC. No Verbnet entry, no comparison. (from besmirch.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: ...you're really besmirching someone 's reputation, Although I 'm not sure you can do that with Karl Rove.
example.arg: Although I 'm not sure you can do that with Karl Rove.
